you can also still ues R!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
plot_df=
  tibble(
    x= runif(100), 
    y= 2 + 2*x + rnorm(100)
  )

plot_df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x=x, y=y)) + 
  geom_point()
```
